title: Sustainability Marketing Specialist
description:
Kering is Hiring – Sustainability Marketing Specialist

We’re looking for a Sustainability Marketing Specialist to join Kering, where luxury meets purpose. Help us promote sustainability for brands like Gucci and Saint Laurent.

About the Role: Craft campaigns that highlight our eco-conscious initiatives and engage luxury consumers.
requirements: 3–5 years of experience in marketing, ideally in sustainability
Knowledge of luxury market and branding
Proficient in Google Analytics, Hootsuite, or similar tools
